description: This quick and delicious air fryer recipe is perfect for an easy dinner. Think golden, crunchy, juicy chicken, fresh veggie ribbons and fluffy rice.
name: Japanese-style karaage chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 95g McCormick Japanese style karaage chicken recipe base

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat air fryer to 185Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Place egg and oil in a shallow bowl and whisk to combine. Place recipe base on a plate. Working with 1 piece of chicken at a time, dip in egg mixture then coat in recipe base. Place on tray.
Place half of the chicken in air-fryer basket. Spray with oil. Cook for 12 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Repeat with remaining chicken and oil spray.
Heat rice according to packet instructions. Divide rice, carrot, cucumber and chicken among plates. Drizzle veg with dressing, sprinkle over onion and serve.
